plot: A man burdened with the knowledge of a lethal secret suddenly finds himself on the run from The Law, an unearthly secret society which will stop at nothing to possess that information.
title: The Law
plot_es: A man burdened with the knowledge of a lethal secret suddenly finds himself on the run from The Law, an unearthly secret society which will stop at nothing to possess that information.
plot_en: A man burdened with the knowledge of a lethal secret suddenly finds himself on the run from The Law, an unearthly secret society which will stop at nothing to possess that information.
